content.description:
A large amphitheatre on Mt Mansfield (west side of the road), filled with numerous lines.   Avalanches have been reported in the approach gullies.   Most of the routes on the centre left can be descended by heading down the treed buttress followed by a single rope rap. 

Blue Ice Bulge, II, WI3-4

  Pick and Choss, M4 

Illogical Hydrology, II, WI4

  Norton-Gibney, II, WI4   California Dreaming, II, WI4 

Blind Fate, III, WI4

  Blind Faith, II, WI3   --   Cass's Gully, WI1-2 

Hidden Gully, II, WI3/4-
